items.title: More than 100 women raped and burned alive in DR Congo jailbreak, UN says
items.description: As M23 rebels entered Goma and the city was plunged into chaos, female prisoners were attacked, the UN says.

items.title: Sweden searches for answers after country's deadliest shooting
items.description: Police say the motive of the shooter, who killed 10 people on Tuesday, remains unknown.

items.title: Concern over Google ending ban on AI weapons
items.description: The tech giant previously ruled out applications that were "likely to cause harm".

items.title: USAID staff will be put on leave starting on Friday
items.description: The agency has become a focus of the Trump administration's efforts to cut government spending.

items.title: Seventeen pupils burnt to death in Nigeria school fire
items.description: The fire is said to have broken out in a nearby house and spread to the school while the children were asleep.
